page.title: 19HORLEY SPORTS CLUBS
page.content: There are lots of different sports clubs available to the people of Horley such as hockey, tennis and Squash, but only the football club is actually situated in our allocated area. Horley Town Football Club was formed in 1898. The present ground was donated to the club by Major Jennings at the end of the second world war. The club now has over two hundred members playing in six teams. Out ofthese six teams three are for children. The senior teams not only play in local leagues but sometimes travel up to two and a half hours to reach a match. Apart from the teams there is a committee and work force of groundsmen, stewards, caterers and team managers which in total involve about thirty local people.
